channel.title: Snoop still bugged
channel.description:
#### What happened? Used Snoop as Apostle, got blank logs. After execution he had logs, My other logs retroactively changed to nothing from previous snoop as well.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Supposed to get the freaking logs
#### Steps to reproduce: Who knows anymore.
#### Comments: This bug has been around forever.

item.title: Snoop still bugged
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
What happened?

Used Snoop as Apostle, got blank logs. After execution he had logs,
My other logs retroactively changed to nothing from previous snoop as well.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Supposed to get the freaking logs

Steps to reproduce:

Who knows anymore.

Comments:

This bug has been around forever.

Read full topic
